definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: yin1 te4 wang3 ti2 gong1 shang1

sentences.english: This is another example of how the Internet has become the fundamental game changer for global business.
sentences.chinese: 这是因特网变成全球商务的游戏改变者的一个例子。

sentences.english: How do the Internet and the ICT revolution affect governance?
sentences.chinese: 因特网和ICT革命怎么影响统治？

sentences.english: So what does the size of the Internet have to do with NAT?
sentences.chinese: 那么面对日益庞大的因特网，NAT该做什么呢？

sentences.english: However, if the Internet is the only outlet available, it's better than nothing, he said.
sentences.chinese: 当然，如因特网是唯一可选的途径，那总比没有好。

sentences.english: The users do not have to set up rules in their applications to use the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 用户不必在他们的应用程序中设置规则以使用因特网。

sentences.english: Virtual library is a very efficient way to organize Internet resouces.
sentences.chinese: 虚拟图书馆是因特网信息资源的有效组织形式。

sentences.english: All forty of the reports in our series can be found on the Internet at voaspecialenglish. com.
sentences.chinese: 所有的四十个报道系列都可在因特网上找到。

sentences.english: They must deploy software resources for consumption over the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须调度软件资源在因特网上的消费。

sentences.english: Technology and science begat both the Internet and the atom bomb, after all.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，科学技术既发明了因特网，也发明了原子弹。

sentences.english: In one move, the hacker has cut off your network from the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅这一下，黑客就能阻止你连上因特网。

sentences.english: Leverage computer and Internet tools to make one's work more efficient.
sentences.chinese: 对计算机及因特网的技能运用自如，提高工作效率。

sentences.english: The United States largely developed the ARPANET and its successor, the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 美国主要发达国家的阿帕网及其后继者，因特网。

sentences.english: Wow, the Internet has a wealth of information available--all true, too.
sentences.chinese: 啊，因特网上真是资源丰富啊。

sentences.english: As the Internet industry develops, there will be an increasing number of folks surfing on the web.
sentences.chinese: 随着因特网业的发展，越来越多的人会上网冲浪。

sentences.english: by not really aggressively educating all of its population about the internet.
sentences.chinese: 没有真正地大力推行全民因特网教育。

definition: variant of 因特網|因特网[Yin1 te4 wang3], Internet
